description: Numbers n such that string 5,7 occurs in the base 8 representation of n but not of n-1.
links: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: a(n) = 512*(n-7)/9 + 376 when n == 7 mod 9; otherwise a(n) = 64*(n - floor((n+1)/9) - 1) + 47. - _Bob Selcoe_, Apr 01 2016a(n) = a(n-1) + a(n-9) - a(n-10). - _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2016
author: _Clark Kimberling_
